attributes.action: Help all children under the age of 18 feel safe.
attributes.additional_details:
Because common sense seems to have disappeared in recent times.
The UNCRC clearly states that all children under the age of 18 have a right to feel safe. 
I feel very strongly that children's rights are not being heard, valued or promoted, especially if a person from an ethnic minority ( who commits a crime against a child) is then given a softer approach by police. A crime is a crime, regardless of anything else and the punishment should be the same for everybody.
attributes.background: I would like the government to reverse the new two tier criminal rule. If you have committed a crime, it should not matter what race, religion etc that you are, the punishment should be the same for everyone that commits the offence.
